name: video_comments
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_scraper_v2.
Tool description: Get basic tiktok user info and medias. Cheap and stable. Telegram https://t.me/JoTucker2022
API description: Fetches comments for a given TikTok video.

video_url.description: The URL of the TikTok video for which comments are to be retrieved.

count.description: The number of comments to retrieve. If not provided, all available comments will be retrieved.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for fetching comments. Defaults to None, indicating the start of the comments.
